DOC.brief_summary: To collect process urine sample critically ill subject use assess effect various urine sample freeze storage condition biomarker test result .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females 21 year age old 2 . Subjects must enrol ( first studyspecific sample collection ) within 24 hour ICU admission Subjects enrol ED Floor must admit ICU within 24 hour enrollment Subjects enrol ICU must admit ICU transfer study ICU another ICU 24 hour prior enrollment 3 . Expected remain ICU least 48 hour enrollment 4 . Use indwell urinary catheter standard care expect least 48 hour enrollment 5 . Subject ( authorized representative ) able willing provide write informed consent study participation 1 . Special population include child , pregnant woman , prisoner 2 . Previous renal transplantation 3 . Already receive dialysis ( either acute chronic ) imminent need dialysis time enrollment 4 . Known infection human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) active hepatitis ( acute chronic ) 5 . Subjects history chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) without baseline serum creatinine value ( baseline within 6 month enrollment ) 6 . Previously provide urine sample enrol study
